articles.description: T20 WC: Afghanistan wicketkeeper-batter Gurbaz was hit on the left foot by Shaheen Afridi's inswinging yorker. He was given some medical attention and was carried off the pitch.
articles.content: Shaheen Afridi was all fired up in Pakistan's warm-up match against Afghanistan on Wednesday. Though the match had to be abandoned due to rain in Brisbane, Shaheen scalped the wickets of Afghanistan … [+1893 chars]
